title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Joy Taylor fills in for Colin discussing the 76ers getting crushed by the Heat and who deserves a majority of the blame for their poor performance. She lays out her issues with the NBA's MVP award and why we need to address the criteria of who qualifies for the award. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to share his "NBA Super Star Club" and which players made the exclusive list. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
